description: The image depicts an indoor scene of a modern library or study hall. The hall is characterized by a long, narrow corridor flanked by wooden tables and chairs, ideal for reading or studying. The architecture features a high ceiling with white beams and multiple skylights that allow natural light to illuminate the space. The floor is covered with a striped carpet that adds a warm tone to the environment. At the center, a black metal staircase with intricate designs leads to an upper level, enhancing the modern aesthetic of the space.
poem:
In a hall so long and quite grand,
With tables on either hand,
A staircase of black,
Leads up and back,
In a place where minds expand.
